Sub: Commencement of Buddy Pair System and other welfare measures in
port Sector.

Interpersonal communication has always been one of the very important basic
ingredients of an efficient, effective and empathetic organization.

02. The efforts to understand the personality of our colleagues, their problems,
strengths and weaknesses, coupled with an inner urge to help each other would
always take any organization to higher levels of excellence.

03. Such efforts lead to many latent positive consequences apart from the obvious
manifest ones. While on one hand they create and cement the bonds between the
members of the Force, making it more cohesive and strengthening the ‘espirit de
corps’, on the other hand, they also help us to identify occupational stressors and
other consequential issues which need immediate resolution, The following 3
systems combined together if attempted very committedly, would create an
atmosphere of empathy, sensitivity and sustained interpersonal communication at
various levels:-

(a) Buddy pairs at all levels
(b) Personal Profile Sheet
(c) Samvaad Samiti

04. Ihave been practicing these systems for many years wherever I was posted and
have found them very effective.

05. I would, therefore, urge all the CASOs and other Unit Commanders to introduce
these systems in their own units and implement the same with personal involvement
(The CASOs will have to visualize their entire unit as comprising of
Sections/Platoons/Companies & build up in upward direction to encompass the entire
Unit & then very meticulously implement the above systems).
